title: Fred and Ricky's Plant Delicious Foods - Westport
description: Grab & go shop opened May 2016 offering plant-based vegan prepared food in BPA-free, reusable & recyclable containers from refrigerated cases. All dishes are oil free (except granola) and many ingredients are local and organic. No preservatives or additives used ever. Find pasta, rice dishes, soups, breads, salads, breakfast items, and desserts. Some dine in available.
